        webVitals.getCLS(setIndicator, true);
        webVitals.getFID(setIndicator, true);
        webVitals.getLCP(setIndicator, true);
      }
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }())

              "washingtonpost.com",

              var error = hint && hint.originalException;

                return event;
              }
              return null;
            }
